definition: stratagem to trap sb/to bewitch and trap
soul/spirit/immortal soul, i.e. that can be detached from the body
disposition of troops/wave/spate/burst/spell/short period of time/classifier for events or states of short duration

sentences.english: The maze trap village has always kept the original pattern for 2000 years.
sentences.chinese: 二千年來，迷魂陣村始終保留着原格局。

sentences.english: The robbers went different ways hoping to put the sheriffs men off the scent.
sentences.chinese: 那夥強盜分路逃走，企圖給警察佈下迷魂陣。
